import os
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
pd.set_option('display.max_columns',500)
sns.set_style('darkgrid')
%matplotlib inline
source.dd3a96a1:
#Load data
data = pd.read_csv('../input/kaggle-survey-2020/kaggle_survey_2020_responses.csv',low_memory = False)

# drop first row
data.drop(0,inplace = True)

data.head(2)
source.4fdc00cc:
age = data['Q1']

plt.figure(figsize= (10,5))
sns.countplot(y = age)
plt.title('Age group of Kagglers',fontsize = 20)
plt.xlabel('Total Responders',fontsize = 20)
plt.ylabel('Age Group',fontsize = 20)
source.aee99aa3:
plt.figure(figsize = (20,5))
sns.countplot(x = data['Q3'], data = data)
plt.title('Country of Residence', fontsize = 20)
plt.xlabel('Countries',fontsize = 20)
plt.ylabel('No of Responders',fontsize = 20)
plt.xticks(rotation = 90)
source.b4210710:
plt.figure(figsize = (20,5))
labels= ['Man','Woman','Prefer not to say','Prefer to self-describe','Nonbinary']
colors = ['yellowgreen', 'gold', 'lightskyblue', 'lightcoral','magenta']
gender = data['Q2'].value_counts()
plt.pie(gender,colors = colors, autopct='%1.1f%%', shadow=True,radius = 2,pctdistance = 1.1)
plt.legend(labels,loc = 'best')
plt.show()
source.096ebe73:
edu = data['Q4']

plt.figure(figsize= (10,5))
sns.countplot(y = edu)
plt.title('Highest Level Education',fontsize = 20)
source.b160ef32:
job_count = data['Q5'].value_counts()
total = data.shape[0]

fig,ax = plt.subplots(figsize=[12,10])

ax.bar(job_count.index, job_count, width = 0.5)

for j in job_count.index:
       ax.annotate('{:.2f}%'.format(job_count[j]/total*100),
                  xy=(j, job_count[j]+10))

plt.xticks(rotation=90, fontsize=12)
plt.ylabel('No of Responders',fontsize = 20)
plt.title('Job Profession Distribution', fontsize = 20)

source.6ab65183: It appears quarter of total responders are students followed by data scientist. It would be interesting to know what other job profession represents which is greater than data analyst.
source.af1cf319: ## What is the job profession of Nepalese Kagglers
source.590c9dd9: It appears female are still behind professional job title wise. With only few software engineers most of others are students
source.ca392faf: Most of the Kagglers are of young age between 18 to 39.

source.903d167b: Bachelor degree is earned most followed by Master's degree. How education varies between male and female.Lets find out

source.d585cf62:
## DS and ML in Nepal

Since i am from Nepal i want to see what how this field is doing in Nepal. Nepal is a sovereign country in South Asia.It is the 49th largest country by population and 93rd largest by area.It is a landlocked country and borders China in north and India in south,east and west. 
![nepal.jpg](attachment:nepal.jpg)
